name: Italian-style Fish Fillets with Pesto
description: Fish in a flash – a gorgeous, healthy dinner ready in 20 minutes.
preparation: Heat 1 tbsp oil in a frying pan over medium-high heat.
Lightly season fish with Black Pepper and place in pan.
Combine tomatoes, Pesto Sauce Mix and remaining oil in a small mixing bowl. Spoon over fillets.
Cover pan and cook for 8–10 minutes, or until fish is opaque.
tips: Thanks to its high basil content, 1 tbsp Pesto Sauce Mix has more antioxidants than 1⁄2 cup chopped sweet cherries.
